attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want more deaf into music videos in such as MTV, Channel U and others.

Millions of deaf talents want to go into music video channels.

We want to break the doors to music video channels.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
